\begin{pspicture}(0,-0.5)(12,12)
  \input{fig/2d-helpers.tex}
	\multiput(1,0)(2,0){5}{
		\multiput(0,1)(0,2){5}{%
			% E-field layer.
		 \psset{linecolor=lightgray,fillcolor=lightgray}
		 \En00x{ex00}
		 \En02x{ex02}
		 \En10z{ez10}
		 \En12z{ez12}
		 \En11y{ey11}
		 \En20x{ex20}
		 \En22x{ex22}
     \E{ex00}{ez10} \E{ez10}{ex20}
     \E{ex02}{ez12} \E{ez12}{ex22}
     \E{ez10}{ey11} \E{ez12}{ey11}
			% H-field layer.
		 \psset{linecolor=black}
			\hn00y{hy00} 
			\hn02y{hy02} 
			\hn20y{hy20} 
			\hn22y{hy22} 
			\hn01z{hz01} 
			\hn21z{hz21} 
			\hn11x{hx11} 
      \E{hy00}{hz01} \E{hz01}{hy02}
      \E{hy20}{hz21} \E{hz21}{hy22}
      \E{hz01}{hx11} \E{hx11}{hz21}
		}
	}
	% Diamonds.
	\pspolygon[linestyle=dashed]
						(6.5,2)(10.5,6)(6.5,10)(2.5,6)
	\pspolygon[linecolor=lightgray,linestyle=dashed]
					  (5.5,2)(9.5,6)(5.5,10)(1.5,6)
  \psframe[linestyle=dotted,linewidth=1pt,linearc=10pt](5.64,4.64)(7.36,6.36)
	\Yaxis01{11}\Xaxis1{11}0  % Axes.
\end{pspicture}
